enumval.name: CanBeShotInVehicle
enumval.description: script can stop peds being shot when driving vehicle (including exposed ones like bikes)

enumval.name: NoCriticalHits
enumval.description: ped cannot be killed by a single bullet

enumval.name: DrownsInWater
enumval.description: does this ped drown or swim?

enumval.name: DrownsInSinkingVehicle
enumval.description: does this ped take damage whilst in a sinking vehicle?

enumval.name: DiesInstantlyWhenSwimming
enumval.description: Ped cannot swim and will die as soon as they are required to swim

enumval.name: HasBulletProofVest
enumval.description: is this ped wearing a bullet proof vest

enumval.name: UpperBodyDamageAnimsOnly
enumval.description: force ped to play only upper body damage anims from weapons

enumval.name: NeverFallOffSkis
enumval.description: Ped will never fall over on skis

enumval.name: NeverEverTargetThisPed
enumval.description: script control over player targeting

enumval.name: ThisPedIsATargetPriority
enumval.description: script control over player targeting

enumval.name: TargettableWithNoLos
enumval.description: script control over player targeting

enumval.name: DoesntListenToPlayerGroupCommands
enumval.description: script can set this so ped will be in players group but not reacting to commands

enumval.name: DoesntDropWeaponsWhenDead
enumval.description: script command

enumval.name: SetDelayedWeaponAsCurrent
enumval.description: when the peds delayed weapon finally loads, set it as the peds current weapon

enumval.name: KeepTasksAfterCleanUp
enumval.description: If true ped will carry on with task even after script ped cleanup

enumval.name: BlockNonTemporaryEvents
enumval.description: ! Set to block any events that might interrupt the currently running tasks.

enumval.name: AllowMedicsToReviveMe
enumval.description: never allow this ped to be revived

enumval.name: MoneyHasBeenGivenByScript
enumval.description: script can give specific amount of money to ped (script peds don't drop any money by default)

enumval.name: NotAllowedToCrouch
enumval.description: Is this ped allowed to crouch at all?

enumval.name: DeathPickupsPersist
enumval.description: script command to control what type of pickups are created when ped dies

enumval.name: IgnoreSeenMelee
enumval.description: script command so ped doesn't stop to watch fights

enumval.name: ForceDieIfInjured
enumval.description: script command so missions peds die if injured

enumval.name: DontDragMeOutCar
enumval.description: force this ped can't be carjacked

enumval.name: StayInCarOnJack
enumval.description: script sets this to keep peds in car when the player steals it

enumval.name: ForceDieInCar
enumval.description: don't fall out car if killed

enumval.name: GetOutUndriveableVehicle
enumval.description: script can stop peds automatically getting out of vehicle when it's upside down or undrivable(for races and stuff)

enumval.name: WillRemainOnBoatAfterMissionEnds
enumval.description: script can stop peds automatically leaving boats when they become random chars, after a script quits

enumval.name: DontStoreAsPersistent
enumval.description: Some peds (like mission peds) should not be stored as persistent.

enumval.name: HasHelmet
enumval.description: currently has helmet equipped?

enumval.name: UseHelmet
enumval.description: will the ped try to put on their helmet?

enumval.name: DontTakeOffHelmet
enumval.description: the ped will not take off their helmet (if equipped) while this is set

enumval.name: PedGeneratesDeadBodyEvents
enumval.description: Generates shocking events as if dead

enumval.name: DontInfluenceWantedLevel
enumval.description: Can do any crime against this character and the cops turn a blind eye (no crime reported)

enumval.name: DisableHornAudioWhenDead
enumval.description: Disable the horn when a ped dies in the car and has his head against the wheel

enumval.name: BlockWeaponSwitching
enumval.description: Disable weapon switching while this is set

enumval.name: BlockGroupPedAimedAtResponse
enumval.description: Disable the behaviour which causes player-group peds to crouch when the player aims at them

enumval.name: WillFollowLeaderAnyMeans
enumval.description: Basically defines whether group peds will use cars etc to follow their leader (default=false)

enumval.name: BlippedByScript
enumval.description: Set to true if the char has ever been blipped, not 100% correct so don't use it on anything sensitive.

enumval.name: DrawRadarVisualField
enumval.description: Draw this peds visual field in the stealth radar

enumval.name: StopWeaponFiringOnImpact
enumval.description: Set to true to stop the peds weapon firing on impact when they drop it

enumval.name: DissableAutoFallOffTests
enumval.description: Set to true to stop ped scanning for things to fall off when shot by the player

enumval.name: SteerAroundDeadBodies
enumval.description: Forces peds to steer around dead bodies, the default is false.

enumval.name: ConstrainToNavMesh
enumval.description: Ped is constrained to navmesh's surface

enumval.name: SyncingAnimatedProps
enumval.description: Set this to true if the ped should attempt to synchronise the animations of an attached prop to its movement anims

enumval.name: IsStanding
enumval.description: is ped standing on something

enumval.name: WasStanding
enumval.description: was the ped standing last frame

enumval.name: InVehicle
enumval.description: is in a vehicle

enumval.name: AttachedToVehicle
enumval.description: is attached to a vehicle

enumval.name: IsSwimming
enumval.description: is ped swimming in water

enumval.name: WasSwimming
enumval.description: was the ped swimming in water last frame

enumval.name: IsSkiing
enumval.description: is the ped skiing

enumval.name: IsSitting
enumval.description: is the ped sitting

enumval.name: KilledByStealth
enumval.description: Determines if this ped was killed by a stealth action

enumval.name: KilledByTakedown
enumval.description: Determines if this ped was killed by a takedown action

enumval.name: Knockedout
enumval.description: Determines if this ped was finished with a knockout action

enumval.name: ClearRadarBlipOnDeath
enumval.description: so peds automatically given blips will clear them again when they die (mainly used for peds recruited into players group)

enumval.name: JustGotOffTrain
enumval.description: train code uses this when grabbing random peds to get in trains

enumval.name: JustGotOnTrain
enumval.description: train code uses this when grabbing random peds to get in trains

enumval.name: UsingCoverPoint
enumval.description: set to true when a ped is in process of using a cover point

enumval.name: IsInTheAir
enumval.description: is in the air

enumval.name: KnockedUpIntoAir
enumval.description: has ped been knocked up into the air by a car collision

enumval.name: IsAimingGun
enumval.description: is ped aiming gun

enumval.name: HasJustLeftCar
enumval.description: used by navigation to force scan for cars collisions

enumval.name: HasBeenBumpedInCar
enumval.description: Has this ped been bumped by a car while driving?

enumval.name: InWaterTaskQuitToClimbLadder
enumval.description: The in-water task has just quit in response to a ladder-climb request

enumval.name: NMTwoHandedWeaponBothHandsConstrained
enumval.description: when using physical 2-handed weapons, both hands have been latched to the gun model (used when sending ConfigureCharacter to NM)

enumval.name: ForcePedLoadCover
enumval.description: Set by the script to force a ped to load cover

enumval.name: JustLeftCarNotCheckedForDoors
enumval.description: Set when a ped exits a car. The first time he he moves he should check for door obstructions.

enumval.name: UsingCrouchedPedCapsule
enumval.description: Set to indicate that the ped's bounds are in the crouched configuration

enumval.name: HasDeadPedBeenReported
enumval.description: Whether this ped has been investigated (for dead peds)

enumval.name: ForcedAim
enumval.description: If set, we will always behave like we have the aim trigger pressed

enumval.name: SteersAroundPeds
enumval.description: Enables/disables the low-level steering behaviour around peds and objects

enumval.name: SteersAroundObjects
enumval.description: Enables/disables the low-level steering behaviour around peds and objects

enumval.name: OpenDoorArmIK
enumval.description: Set if the ped should enable open door arm IK

enumval.name: ForceReload
enumval.description: Force a reload of the current weapon

enumval.name: DontActivateRagdollFromVehicleImpact
enumval.description: Blocks ragdoll activation when hit by a vehicle

enumval.name: DontActivateRagdollFromBulletImpact
enumval.description: Blocks ragdoll activation when hit by a bullet

enumval.name: DontActivateRagdollFromExplosions
enumval.description: Blocks ragdoll activation when hit by an explosive

enumval.name: DontActivateRagdollFromFire
enumval.description: Blocks ragdoll activation when set on fire

enumval.name: DontActivateRagdollFromElectrocution
enumval.description: Blocks ragdoll activation when electrocuted

enumval.name: IsBeingDraggedToSafety
enumval.description: Whether this ped is being dragged to safety

enumval.name: HasBeenDraggedToSafety
enumval.description: Whether this ped has been dragged to safety

enumval.name: KeepWeaponHolsteredUnlessFired
enumval.description: Ignores the creation of the weapon object unless the gun is shot.

enumval.name: ForceScriptControlledKnockout
enumval.description: Forces a melee knockout state for the victim ped

enumval.name: FallOutOfVehicleWhenKilled
enumval.description: Forces a ped to fall out of a vehicle when killed

enumval.name: GetOutBurningVehicle
enumval.description: If set, a ped will escape a burning vehicle they are inside

enumval.name: BumpedByPlayer
enumval.description: Whether this ped has been bumped by the player.

enumval.name: RunFromFiresAndExplosions
enumval.description: If set, a ped will run away from fires or potential explosions

enumval.name: TreatAsPlayerDuringTargeting
enumval.description: If set, the ped will be given the same boost a player gets in the targeting scoring system.

enumval.name: IsHandCuffed
enumval.description: indicates if the ped is currently hand cuffed

enumval.name: IsAnkleCuffed
enumval.description: indicates if the ped is currently ankle cuffed

enumval.name: DisableMelee
enumval.description: Disables the melee for a particular ped

enumval.name: DisableUnarmedDrivebys
enumval.description: Disables unarmed driveby taunts for ped

enumval.name: JustGetsPulledOutWhenElectrocuted
enumval.description: MP only, if ped is electrocuted or rubber bulletted, players jacking the ped will just pull them out

enumval.name: WillNotHotwireLawEnforcementVehicle
enumval.description: True if the ped will skip hotwiring a law enforcement vehicle if it needs to be hotwired

enumval.name: WillCommandeerRatherThanJack
enumval.description: True if the ped will try to commandeer a vehicle rather than jack if possible

enumval.name: CanBeAgitated
enumval.description: True if the ped will respond to agitation events

enumval.name: ForcePedToFaceLeftInCover
enumval.description: If set ped will turn to face left in cover

enumval.name: ForcePedToFaceRightInCover
enumval.description: If set ped will turn to face right in cover

enumval.name: BlockPedFromTurningInCover
enumval.description: If set ped will not turn in cover, unless one of the force flags is set

enumval.name: KeepRelationshipGroupAfterCleanUp
enumval.description: Will allow the ped to keep their relationship group after mission cleanup as opposed to going back to default

enumval.name: ForcePedToBeDragged
enumval.description: Forces Ped To Loop Try Locked Door Anim In Order To Be Dragged Along When Vehicle Moves

enumval.name: PreventPedFromReactingToBeingJacked
enumval.description: Ped doesn't react when being jacked

enumval.name: IsScuba
enumval.description: indicates if the ped is currently equipped for scuba

enumval.name: WillArrestRatherThanJack
enumval.description: For cops arresting peds in vehicles

enumval.name: RemoveDeadExtraFarAway
enumval.description: We must be further away before ped polulation remove this ped when it is dead

enumval.name: RidingTrain
enumval.description: True if the ped is riding a train

enumval.name: ArrestResult
enumval.description: True if the arrest task succeeded

enumval.name: CanAttackFriendly
enumval.description: True allows this ped to attack peds theya re friendly with

enumval.name: WillJackAnyPlayer
enumval.description: True if this player ped can jack any other player (MP Only)

enumval.name: BumpedByPlayerVehicle
enumval.description: Whether this ped has been bumped by a player vehicle.

enumval.name: DodgedPlayerVehicle
enumval.description: Whether this ped has just dodged a player vehicle.

enumval.name: WillJackWantedPlayersRatherThanStealCar
enumval.description: True if this player will jack wanted passengers rather than try to steal a car (cops arresting crims) (MP Only)

enumval.name: NoCopWantedAggro
enumval.description: If this flag is set on a cap, skip some of the code that would normally make them extra aggressive and alert.

enumval.name: DisableLadderClimbing
enumval.description: If this flag is set on a ped it will not scan for or climb ladders

enumval.name: StairsDetected
enumval.description: If this flag is set on a ped it has detected stairs

enumval.name: SlopeDetected
enumval.description: If this flag is set on a ped it has detected a slope

enumval.name: HelmetHasBeenShot
enumval.description: If this flag is set on a ped it's helmet has been damaged

enumval.name: CowerInsteadOfFlee
enumval.description: If set, the ped will cower in place rather than flee, used. Used for scenarios in confined spaces.

enumval.name: CanActivateRagdollWhenVehicleUpsideDown
enumval.description: If set the ped will be allowed to ragdoll when the vehicle they are in gets turned upside down if the seat supports it.

enumval.name: AlwaysRespondToCriesForHelp
enumval.description: If set, the ped will respond to CEventInjuredCryForHelp regardless if it is allied with the injured ped.

enumval.name: ShouldFixIfNoCollision
enumval.description: If set, the ped will be fixed if there is no collision around.

enumval.name: CanPerformArrest
enumval.description: If set, the ped can perform arrests on peds that can be arrested

enumval.name: CanPerformUncuff
enumval.description: If set, the ped can uncuff peds that are handcuffed

enumval.name: CanBeArrested
enumval.description: If set, the ped may be arrested

enumval.name: MoverConstrictedByOpposingCollisions
enumval.description: If set, the ped's mover is getting collisions from opposing sides.

enumval.name: PlayerPreferFrontSeatMP
enumval.description: When true, Prefer the front seat when getting in a car with buddies.

enumval.name: IsInjured
enumval.description: When true, the ped will use injured movement anim sets and getup animations.

enumval.name: DontEnterVehiclesInPlayersGroup
enumval.description: When true, will follow the player around if in their group but wont enter vehicles.

enumval.name: SwimmingTasksRunning
enumval.description: stronger than IsSwimming, persists so long as the tasks are active

enumval.name: PreventAllMeleeTaunts
enumval.description: Disable all melee taunts for this particular ped

enumval.name: ForceDirectEntry
enumval.description: Will force this ped to use the direct entry point for any vehicle they try to enter, or warp in

enumval.name: AlwaysSeeApproachingVehicles
enumval.description: This ped will always see approaching vehicles (even from behind).

enumval.name: CanDiveAwayFromApproachingVehicles
enumval.description: This ped can dive away from approaching vehicles.

enumval.name: AllowPlayerToInterruptVehicleEntryExit
enumval.description: Will allow player to interrupt a peds scripted entry/exit task as if they had triggered it themselves

enumval.name: OnlyAttackLawIfPlayerIsWanted
enumval.description: This ped won't attack cops unless the player is wanted.

enumval.name: PlayerInContactWithKinematicPed
enumval.description: Gets set to true if the player ped is colliding against a ped in kinematic mode.

enumval.name: PlayerInContactWithSomethingOtherThanKinematicPed
enumval.description: Gets set to true if the player ped is colliding against something which isn't a ped in kinematic mode.

enumval.name: PedsJackingMeDontGetIn
enumval.description: If set any ped jacking this ped will not get in as part of the jack.

enumval.name: PedIgnoresAnimInterruptEvents
enumval.description: AI peds only, will not early out of anims

enumval.name: IsInCustody
enumval.description: Signifies a player is in custody

enumval.name: ForceStandardBumpReactionThresholds
enumval.description: By default, armed and friendly peds have increased resistance to being bumped by players and friendly vehicles. Setting this flag will make them use the standard thresholds instead.

enumval.name: LawWillOnlyAttackIfPlayerIsWanted
enumval.description: If set, this ped can only be attacked by law if the player is wanted

enumval.name: IsAgitated
enumval.description: If set, this ped is agitated.

enumval.name: PreventAutoShuffleToDriversSeat
enumval.description: MP only, prevents passenger from auto shuffling over to drivers seat if it becomes free.

enumval.name: UseKinematicModeWhenStationary
enumval.description: When enabled, the ped will continually set the kinematic mode reset flag when stationary.

enumval.name: EnableWeaponBlocking
enumval.description: When enabled, Non-player peds can use WeaponBlocking behaviors

enumval.name: DisableHurt
enumval.description: Will prevent the peds go into hurt combat mode

enumval.name: PlayerIsWeird
enumval.description: Should this player ped periodically generate shocking events for being weird.

enumval.name: PedHadPhoneConversation
enumval.description: Has this ped had a phone conversation before.

enumval.name: BeganCrossingRoad
enumval.description: Indicates ped started crossing the road in case of interruption.

enumval.name: WarpIntoLeadersVehicle
enumval.description: Warp into leaders vehicle

enumval.name: DoNothingWhenOnFootByDefault
enumval.description: Do nothing when on foot by default

enumval.name: UsingScenario
enumval.description: Set when the ped is using a scenario. Call CPed::UpdateSpatialArrayTypeFlags() if changing.

enumval.name: VisibleOnScreen
enumval.description: Set when the ped is visible on screen, as determined by CPedAILodManager.

enumval.name: DontCollideWithKinematic
enumval.description: If true, the ped will not collide with other kinematic peds.

enumval.name: ActivateOnSwitchFromLowPhysicsLod
enumval.description: If set, activate physics when switching from low to regular physics LOD.

enumval.name: DontActivateRagdollOnPedCollisionWhenDead
enumval.description: Peds with this flag set won't be allowed to reactivate their ragdoll when hit by another ragdoll.

enumval.name: DontActivateRagdollOnVehicleCollisionWhenDead
enumval.description: Peds with this flag set won't be allowed to reactivate their ragdoll when hit by a vehicle.

enumval.name: HasBeenInArmedCombat
enumval.description: Is set if this ped has ever been in armed combat

enumval.name: UseDiminishingAmmoRate
enumval.description: Set for when we want to diminish the ammo at a slower rate. Used specifically in cases where AI do not have infinite ammo.

enumval.name: Avoidance_Ignore_All
enumval.description: This ped won't steer around anyone

enumval.name: Avoidance_Ignored_by_All
enumval.description: Other peds won't steer around this ped

enumval.name: Avoidance_Ignore_Group1
enumval.description: This ped won't steer around peds marked group 1

enumval.name: Avoidance_Member_of_Group1
enumval.description: This ped is marked as a member of avoidance group 1

enumval.name: ForcedToUseSpecificGroupSeatIndex
enumval.description: Ped is forced to use specific seat index set by SET_PED_GROUP_MEMBER_PASSENGER_INDEX

enumval.name: LowPhysicsLodMayPlaceOnNavMesh
enumval.description: If set, peds in low lod physics will be placed so that their feet rest on the navmesh

enumval.name: DisableExplosionReactions
enumval.description: If set, peds will disable all explosion reactions

enumval.name: DodgedPlayer
enumval.description: Whether this ped has just dodged a player.

enumval.name: WaitingForPlayerControlInterrupt
enumval.description: Set when player switches to an ai ped and keeps the scripted task of the ai ped

enumval.name: ForcedToStayInCover
enumval.description: Ped won't move out of cover when set (not even to fire).

enumval.name: GeneratesSoundEvents
enumval.description: Does this ped generate sound events?

enumval.name: ListensToSoundEvents
enumval.description: Does this ped have the ability to respond to sound events?

enumval.name: AllowToBeTargetedInAVehicle
enumval.description: Ped can be targeting inside a vehicle

enumval.name: SteersAroundVehicles
enumval.description: Enables/disables the low-level steering behaviour around vehicles

enumval.name: AllowPedInVehiclesOverrideTaskFlags
enumval.description: If set, allow the ped to be set in vehicles even if the ped's TaskData would otherwise disallow it.

enumval.name: DontEnterLeadersVehicle
enumval.description: If set, the ped will not enter the leader's vehicle.

enumval.name: ScriptHasDisabledCollision
enumval.description: Script disabled collision on this ped via SET_ENTITY_COLLISION, this leaves on collision against explosions and weapons

enumval.name: UseAmbientModelScaling
enumval.description: This ped is drawn randomly scaled from [0.5,1.0]

enumval.name: DontWatchFirstOnNextHurryAway
enumval.description: Hurry away without watching the next time this ped runs CTaskHurryAway.

enumval.name: DisablePotentialToBeWalkedIntoResponse
enumval.description: make EVENT_POTENTIAL_BE_WALKED_INTO not affect this ped.

enumval.name: DisablePedAvoidance
enumval.description: This ped will not avoid other peds whilst navigating

enumval.name: ForceRagdollUponDeath
enumval.description: When the ped dies, it will ragdoll instead of potentially choosing an animated death.

enumval.name: CanLosePropsOnDamage
enumval.description: When ped receives damage any prop glasses could be knocked off

enumval.name: AllowedToDetachTrailer
enumval.description: Allow this ped to detach trailers from vehicles

enumval.name: AllowBlockDeadPedRagdollActivation
enumval.description: If set, the ragdoll activation blocking flags can be used to disable activation of dead peds. Otherwise, by default, dead peds can always activate their ragdolls

enumval.name: IsHoldingProp
enumval.description: True if the ped is currently holding a prop.

enumval.name: BlocksPathingWhenDead
enumval.description: When this ped dies their body will block all pathfinding modes - not just wandering.

enumval.name: ForcePlayNormalScenarioExitOnNextScriptCommand
enumval.description: The next time this ped leaves a scenario to perform some script task they will be forced into their normal scenario exit.

enumval.name: ForcePlayImmediateScenarioExitOnNextScriptCommand
enumval.description: The next time this ped leaves a scneario to perform some script task they will be forced into their immediate (blend out) exit.

enumval.name: ForceSkinCharacterCloth
enumval.description: Force character cloth to stay skinned immediately after being created. If flag is not set then character cloth is not forced to be skinned when created.

enumval.name: LeaveEngineOnWhenExitingVehicles
enumval.description: The player will leave the engine running when leaving vehicles

enumval.name: PhoneDisableTextingAnimations
enumval.description: tells taskmobile phone to not texting animations. Currently don't play these in MP

enumval.name: PhoneDisableTalkingAnimations
enumval.description: tells taskmobile phone to not talking animations. Currently don't play these in MP

enumval.name: PhoneDisableCameraAnimations
enumval.description: tells taskmobile phone to not camera animations. Currently don't play these in SP

enumval.name: DisableBlindFiringInShotReactions
enumval.description: Stops the ped from accidentally blind firing it's weapon when doing an nm shot reaction

enumval.name: AllowNearbyCoverUsage
enumval.description: This makes it so that OTHER peds are allowed to take cover at points that would otherwise be rejected due to proximity

enumval.name: InStrafeTransition
enumval.description: True if in strafe transition.

enumval.name: CanPlayInCarIdles
enumval.description: If false, blocks in-car idle animations from playing.

enumval.name: CanAttackNonWantedPlayerAsLaw
enumval.description: If this is a law ped then it will ignore the player wanted level clean check in combat and continue attacking

enumval.name: WillTakeDamageWhenVehicleCrashes
enumval.description: Ped gets damaged when the vehicle they are in crashes

enumval.name: AICanDrivePlayerAsRearPassenger
enumval.description: If this ai ped is driving the vehicle, if the player taps to enter, they will enter as a rear passenger, if they hold, they'll jack the driver

enumval.name: PlayerCanJackFriendlyPlayers
enumval.description: If a friendly player is driving the vehicle, if the player taps to enter, they will enter as a passenger, if they hold, they'll jack the driver

enumval.name: OnStairs
enumval.description: Are we on stairs?

enumval.name: SimulatingAiming
enumval.description: Simulating the aim button for player until on input detection.

enumval.name: AIDriverAllowFriendlyPassengerSeatEntry
enumval.description: If this ai ped is driving the vehicle, allow players to get in passenger seats

enumval.name: ParentCarIsBeingRemoved
enumval.description: Set on the target ped if the car they are in is being removed to avoid an expensive detach check

enumval.name: AllowMissionPedToUseInjuredMovement
enumval.description: Set the target ped to be allowed to use Injured movement clips

enumval.name: CanLoseHelmetOnDamage
enumval.description: When ped receives a head shot then a helmet can be knocked off

enumval.name: NeverDoScenarioExitProbeChecks
enumval.description: When this ped exits a scenario they ignore probe checks against the environment and just pick an exit clip.

enumval.name: SuppressLowLODRagdollSwitchWhenCorpseSettles
enumval.description: This will suppress the automatic switch to a lower ragdoll LOD when switching to the ragdoll frame after dying.

enumval.name: PreventUsingLowerPrioritySeats
enumval.description: Don't use certain seats (like hanging on the side of a vehicle)

enumval.name: JustLeftVehicleNeedsReset
enumval.description: Set when leaving a vehicle and disabling collision with the vehicle exiting to indicate we need to clear out the disabling

enumval.name: TeleportIfCantReachPlayer
enumval.description: If this ped is following the player and stuck in a place where he can't be reached, teleport when possible.

enumval.name: PedsInVehiclePositionNeedsReset
enumval.description: Ped was being jacked/killed but isn't anymore, ensure they're in the seat

enumval.name: PedsFullyInSeat
enumval.description: Ped is fully in the seat (Set after the position needs reset flag)

enumval.name: AllowPlayerLockOnIfFriendly
enumval.description: If this ped is friendly with the player, this will allow the ped to lockon

enumval.name: UseCameraHeadingForDesiredDirectionLockOnTest
enumval.description: Force camera direction for heading test if desired direction is also set

enumval.name: TeleportToLeaderVehicle
enumval.description: If set, teleport if ped is not in the leader's vehicle before TaskEnterVehicle::m_SecondsBeforeWarpToLeader.

enumval.name: Avoidance_Ignore_WeirdPedBuffer
enumval.description: Don't give weird peds extra buffer

enumval.name: OnStairSlope
enumval.description: Are we on a stair slope?

enumval.name: HasPlayedNMGetup
enumval.description: This ped has gotten up from NM at least once.

enumval.name: DontBlipCop
enumval.description: Wanted system shouldnt consider this ped when creating blips.

enumval.name: SpawnedAtExtendedRangeScenario
enumval.description: Set if the ped spawned at a scenario with extended range.

enumval.name: WalkAlongsideLeaderWhenClose
enumval.description: This ped will walk alongside group leader if they are the first member of the leader's pedgroup, they are close enough to the leader, and the pedgroup's formation is set up to allow this (such as in the default CPedFormationTypes::FORMATION_LOOSE).

enumval.name: KillWhenTrapped
enumval.description: This will kill a mission ped that becomes trapped (like under a cow carcass) and cannot getup.

enumval.name: EdgeDetected
enumval.description: If this flag is set on a ped it has detected an edge

enumval.name: AlwaysWakeUpPhysicsOfIntersectedPeds
enumval.description: This ped will cause physics to activate on any ped this ped's capsule is inside of, even if this ped is being attached.

enumval.name: EquippedAmbientLoadOutWeapon
enumval.description: This is set to prevent a ped from holstering a loadout weapon equipped during CPedPopulation::EquipPed as part of the defined CAmbientPedModelVariations' loadout.

enumval.name: AvoidTearGas
enumval.description: If set, a ped will avoid tear gas.

enumval.name: StoppedSpeechUponFreezing
enumval.description: Marks that we've already dealt with cleaning up speech audio after becoming frozen.

enumval.name: DisableGoToWritheWhenInjured
enumval.description: If set, CPed::DAMAGED_GOTOWRITHE will no longer get set. In particular, tazer hits wil no longer kill this ped in one hit.

enumval.name: OnlyUseForcedSeatWhenEnteringHeliInGroup
enumval.description: If set this ped will only use their forced seat index if the vehicle they're entering is a heli as part of a group

enumval.name: ThrownFromVehicleDueToExhaustion
enumval.description: Ped got tired and was thrown from bike. Used to scale ragdoll damage for a few seconds after the dismount.

enumval.name: UpdateEnclosedSearchRegion
enumval.description: This ped will update their enclosed regions

enumval.name: ShouldChargeNow
enumval.description: This ped should charge if in combat right away, for use by scripts, cleared once ped charges

enumval.name: RagdollingOnBoat
enumval.description: We don't want ragdolling peds processing buoyancy when in a boat.

enumval.name: AllowMinorReactionsAsMissionPed
enumval.description: If true, this ped will react to events such as being hit by a vehicle as a mission ped

enumval.name: BlockDeadBodyShockingEventsWhenDead
enumval.description: If true, this ped will not generate dead body shocking events when dead.

enumval.name: PedHasBeenSeen
enumval.description: True if the ped has be visible to the player

enumval.name: PedIsInReusePool
enumval.description: True if the ped is currently in the ped reuse pool

enumval.name: PedWasReused
enumval.description: True if the ped was in the reuse pool and then was reused

enumval.name: MovedUsingLowLodPhysicsSinceLastActive
enumval.description: Set for peds that have moved using low LOD physics

enumval.name: NeverReactToPedOnRoof
enumval.description: If true, this ped will not react to a ped standing on the roof.

enumval.name: ForcePlayFleeScenarioExitOnNextScriptCommand
enumval.description: If set this ped will use a flee exit to leave on the next script command.

enumval.name: JustBumpedIntoVehicle
enumval.description: Set for peds that just bumped into a vehicle

enumval.name: ShouldThrowSmokeNow
enumval.description: This ped should throw a smoke grenade in combat right away, for use by scripts, cleared once ped throws

enumval.name: DisablePedConstraints
enumval.description: Flags the ped to ensure it either does or does not have its control constraints

enumval.name: ForceInitialPeekInCover
enumval.description: If set, ped will peek once before firing in cover. Cleared upon peeking.

enumval.name: CreatedByDispatch
enumval.description: this ped was created by one of the dispatch systems, usually law enforcement

enumval.name: PointGunLeftHandSupporting
enumval.description: NM state config flag. Set to true when the characters support hand has broken from the weapon

enumval.name: DisableJumpingFromVehiclesAfterLeader
enumval.description: If true, ped will not bail out of a vehicle after his group leader.

enumval.name: DontActivateRagdollFromPlayerPedImpact
enumval.description: Blocks ragdoll activation from animated player ped bumps

enumval.name: DontActivateRagdollFromAiRagdollImpact
enumval.description: Blocks ragdoll activation from collisions with ai ragdolls

enumval.name: DontActivateRagdollFromPlayerRagdollImpact
enumval.description: Blocks ragdoll activation from collisions with a ragdolling player

enumval.name: DisableQuadrupedSpring
enumval.description: Use to disable quadruped spring processing when settling from a ragdoll performance

enumval.name: IsInCluster
enumval.description: This ped is currently in a cluster.

enumval.name: ShoutToGroupOnPlayerMelee
enumval.description: If set, ped will shout target position when melee attacked by a player

enumval.name: IgnoredByAutoOpenDoors
enumval.description: Set this for a ped to be ignored by the auto opened doors when checking to see if the door should be opened.

enumval.name: PreferInjuredGetup
enumval.description: Set this during nm tasks to trigger an injured geup when the ped gets up.

enumval.name: ForceIgnoreMeleeActiveCombatant
enumval.description: Purposely ignore the melee active combatant role and push them into a support or inactive combatant role

enumval.name: CheckLoSForSoundEvents
enumval.description: If set, ped will ignore sound events generated by entites it can't see.

enumval.name: JackedAbandonedCar
enumval.description: This ped was spawned to steal an ambient car that was left around

enumval.name: CanSayFollowedByPlayerAudio
enumval.description: If set, ped can play FRIEND_FOLLOWED_BY_PLAYER lines.

enumval.name: ActivateRagdollFromMinorPlayerContact
enumval.description: If set, the ped will activate the nm ragdoll balance as soon as he's touhed by the player (ignoring velocity thresholds).

enumval.name: HasPortablePickupAttached
enumval.description: If set, the ped is carrying a portable pickuup.

enumval.name: ForcePoseCharacterCloth
enumval.description: If set, default cloth pose will be applied if is available in the character cloth when the cloth is created.

enumval.name: HasClothCollisionBounds
enumval.description: If set, ped will use cloth collision bounds.

enumval.name: HasHighHeels
enumval.description: Set when the ped has high heels

enumval.name: TreatAsAmbientPedForDriverLockOn
enumval.description: If set, this force player ped to treat this ped as an ambient target rather than a mission ped for driver lock on

enumval.name: DontBehaveLikeLaw
enumval.description: Currently used to prevent security peds from behaving like police (they will not report wanted position, can attack without WL, etc)

enumval.name: SpawnedAtScenario
enumval.description: If set, the ped was originally spawned at a scenario point.

enumval.name: DisablePoliceInvestigatingBody
enumval.description: If set, police will not perform the CTaskShockingPoliceInvestigate Behavior on the ped

enumval.name: DisableWritheShootFromGround
enumval.description: If set, the ped will no longer shoot while writhing.

enumval.name: DontBlip
enumval.description: Stops a ped being blipped by the wanted system

enumval.name: IsSwitchingWeapon
enumval.description: ped is running the swap weapon task

enumval.name: IgnoreLegIkRestrictions
enumval.description: If set, the ped will ignore leg IK request restrictions for non-player peds.

enumval.name: ScriptForceNoTimesliceIntelligenceUpdate
enumval.description: If set, the ped will never have their intelligence update time sliced across frames.

enumval.name: JackedOutOfMyVehicle
enumval.description: If set, this ped has been jacked out of its vehicle.

enumval.name: WentIntoCombatAfterBeingJacked
enumval.description: If set, this ped went into combat because of being jacked.

enumval.name: DontActivateRagdollForVehicleGrab
enumval.description: Blocks ragdoll activation when grabbing vehicle doors

enumval.name: ForcePackageCharacterCloth
enumval.description: Set the flag for forcing package on character cloth when cloth is created on the ped

enumval.name: AllowTaskDoNothingTimeslicing
enumval.description: If set, this ped will timeslice it's DoNothing Task when computing default task.

enumval.name: ForceProneCharacterCloth
enumval.description: Set the flag to place character cloth in prone state when cloth is created on the ped

enumval.name: KilledByStandardMelee
enumval.description: Killed by standard melee

enumval.name: AlwaysLeaveTrainUponArrival
enumval.description: Does this ped always (not randomly) leave the train when it arrives at a station

enumval.name: ForcePlayDirectedNormalScenarioExitOnNextScriptCommand
enumval.description: Set flag to determine that a directed normal exit should be use for new tasks on this scenario ped.

enumval.name: OnlyWritheFromWeaponDamage
enumval.description: Only allow ped to writhe from weapon damage, not from other stuff, like small vehicle impacts

enumval.name: UseSloMoBloodVfx
enumval.description: Flags the ped to use the slo mo blood vfx instead of the normal ones

enumval.name: EquipJetpack
enumval.description: Equip/put on the jetpack if we have one in our inventory

enumval.name: PreventDraggedOutOfCarThreatResponse
enumval.description: Don't do threat response when dragged out of a car

enumval.name: ScriptHasCompletelyDisabledCollision
enumval.description: Script has completely disabled collision on this ped via SET_ENTITY_COMPLETELY_DISABLE_COLLISION

enumval.name: NeverDoScenarioNavChecks
enumval.description: This ped will not check for navmesh when exiting their scenario.

enumval.name: ForceSynchronousScenarioExitChecking
enumval.description: This ped will expensively probe for a scenario exit location in one frame.

enumval.name: ThrowingGrenadeWhileAiming
enumval.description: Set true in CTaskAimGunOnFoot::Aiming_OnUpdate, false in CTaskAimAndThrowProjectile::CleanUp.

enumval.name: HeadbobToRadioEnabled
enumval.description: Set in.

enumval.name: ForceDeepSurfaceCheck
enumval.description: Don't do distance from camera culling of the deep surface check, needed for detecting snow, mud, etc.

enumval.name: DisableDeepSurfaceAnims
enumval.description: Disable deep surface anims to prevent them slowing ped down

enumval.name: DontBlipNotSynced
enumval.description: Don't blip this ped, this is not synced over the network to allow script to individually control a peds blippedness on different machines

enumval.name: IsDuckingInVehicle
enumval.description: Ped is ducking inside a vehicle.

enumval.name: DisableEventInteriorStatusCheck
enumval.description: Disables the ignore events based on interior status check which normally has peds inside ignore events from outside

enumval.name: HasReserveParachute
enumval.description: Does ped have a reserve chute that they can deploy

enumval.name: UseReserveParachute
enumval.description: Use reserve parachute settings.

enumval.name: TreatDislikeAsHateWhenInCombat
enumval.description: If this ped is in combat then any ped they dislike they will consider the relationship hate instead

enumval.name: OnlyUpdateTargetWantedIfSeen
enumval.description: If the target is a player we will only set the WL or update the radar if they are seen

enumval.name: AllowAutoShuffleToDriversSeat
enumval.description: Allows this ped to auto shuffle to the driver seat of a vehicle if the driver is dead (law and MP peds would do this normally)

enumval.name: DontActivateRagdollFromSmokeGrenade
enumval.description: Blocks ragdoll activation when damaged by smoke grenade

enumval.name: LinkMBRToOwnerOnChain
enumval.description: This ped will attempt to match the speed of the owner while following its current scenario chain.

enumval.name: AmbientFriendBumpedByPlayer
enumval.description: The player has walked into our ambient friend.

enumval.name: AmbientFriendBumpedByPlayerVehicle
enumval.description: The player has driven into our ambient friend.

enumval.name: InFPSUnholsterTransition
enumval.description: Player is playing the unholster transition in FPS mode

enumval.name: PreventReactingToSilencedCloneBullets
enumval.description: Prevents the ped from reacting to silenced bullets fired from network clone peds

enumval.name: DisableInjuredCryForHelpEvents
enumval.description: Blocks ped from creating the injured cry for help events (run over, tazed or melee would usually do this)

enumval.name: NeverLeaveTrain
enumval.description: Prevents peds riding trains from getting off them

enumval.name: DontDropJetpackOnDeath
enumval.description: When dead, don't drop eqquiped jetpack

enumval.name: UseFPSUnholsterTransitionDuringCombatRoll
enumval.description: Player is playing the unholster transition in FPS mode

enumval.name: ExitingFPSCombatRoll
enumval.description: Player is exiting combat roll in FPS mode

enumval.name: ScriptHasControlOfPlayer
enumval.description: True when script is controlling the movement of the player

enumval.name: PlayFPSIdleFidgetsForProjectile
enumval.description: True when we should be playing idle fidgets for projectiles

enumval.name: DisableAutoEquipHelmetsInBikes
enumval.description: Set from interaction menu

enumval.name: DisableAutoEquipHelmetsInAircraft
enumval.description: Set from interaction menu

enumval.name: WasPlayingFPSGetup
enumval.description: Was playing getup animations in FPS mode

enumval.name: WasPlayingFPSMeleeActionResult
enumval.description: Was playing action result animations in FPS mode

enumval.name: PreferNoPriorityRemoval
enumval.description: Unless scenario conditions apply, make this ped go through normal deletion but not priority deletion.

enumval.name: FPSFidgetsAbortedOnFire
enumval.description: True when the FPS idle fidgets are aborted because the player fired the gun

enumval.name: ForceFPSIKWithUpperBodyAnim
enumval.description: True when upper body anims are used during various tasks.

enumval.name: SwitchingCharactersInFirstPerson
enumval.description: True we switch a character in first person mode (in CGameWorld::ChangePlayerPed)

enumval.name: IsClimbingLadder
enumval.description: True when the ped is climbing a ladder

enumval.name: HasBareFeet
enumval.description: Set when the ped has no shoes

enumval.name: GoOnWithoutVehicleIfItIsUnableToGetBackToRoad
enumval.description: It will force the ped to abandon its vehicle (when using TaskGoToPointAnyMeans) if it is unable to get back to road

enumval.name: BlockDroppingHealthSnacksOnDeath
enumval.description: Set by script to prevent peds from dropping snack health pickups on death (in CPed::CreateDeadPedPickups).

enumval.name: ResetLastVehicleOnVehicleExit
enumval.description: Reset the ped's stored MyVehicle pointer when this ped leaves their vehicle.

enumval.name: ForceThreatResponseToNonFriendToFriendMeleeActions
enumval.description: Forces threat response to melee actions from non friend to friend peds.

enumval.name: DontRespondToRandomPedsDamage
enumval.description: Do not respond to random peds damage

enumval.name: AllowContinuousThreatResponseWantedLevelUpdates
enumval.description: Shares logic of OnlyUpdateTargetWantedIfSeen but will continue to check even after the initial WL is set

enumval.name: KeepTargetLossResponseOnCleanup
enumval.description: On cleanup the ped will not reset their target loss response

enumval.name: PlayersDontDragMeOutOfCar
enumval.description: Similar to DontDragMeOutCar except it only prevents players from dragging the ped out and allows AI to still do so

enumval.name: BroadcastRepondedToThreatWhenGoingToPointShooting
enumval.description: Whenever the ped starts shooting while going to a point, it trigger a responded to threat broadcast

enumval.name: IgnorePedTypeForIsFriendlyWith
enumval.description: If this is set then IsFriendlyWith will ignore the ped type checks (i.e. two PEDTYPE_COP peds are not automatically friendly)

enumval.name: TreatNonFriendlyAsHateWhenInCombat
enumval.description: Any non friendly ped will be considered as hated instead

enumval.name: DontLeaveVehicleIfLeaderNotInVehicle
enumval.description: Supresses exit vehicle task being created in CEventLeaderExitedCarAsDriver::CreateResponseTask.

enumval.name: ChangeFromPermanentToAmbientPopTypeOnMigration
enumval.description: Change ped to ambient pop type on migration.

enumval.name: AllowMeleeReactionIfMeleeProofIsOn
enumval.description: Allow melee reaction to come through even if proof is on

enumval.name: UsingLowriderLeans
enumval.description: Ped is playing lowrider lean animations due to vehicle suspension modification.

enumval.name: UsingAlternateLowriderLeans
enumval.description: Ped is playing alternate lowrider lean animations (ie arm on window) due to vehicle suspension modification.

enumval.name: UseNormalExplosionDamageWhenBlownUpInVehicle
enumval.description: If this is set, the ped won't be instantly killed if vehicle is blown up (from CAutomobile::BlowUpCar -> KillPedsInVehicle). Instead, they will take normal explosive damage and be forced to exit the vehicle if they're still alive.

enumval.name: DisableHomingMissileLockForVehiclePedInside
enumval.description: Blocks locking on of the vehicle that the ped is inside.

enumval.name: DisableTakeOffScubaGear
enumval.description: Same as CPED_RESET_FLAG_DisableTakeOffScubaGear but on a config flag.

enumval.name: IgnoreMeleeFistWeaponDamageMult
enumval.description: Melee fist weapons (ie knuckle duster) won't apply relative health damage scaler (m_MeleeRightFistTargetHealthDamageScaler in weapon info).

enumval.name: LawPedsCanFleeFromNonWantedPlayer
enumval.description: Allows law ped to flee even if ped is not wanted and CWanted::m_AllRandomsFlee is set.

enumval.name: ForceBlipSecurityPedsIfPlayerIsWanted
enumval.description: Forces security peds (not cop peds) to be blipped on the minimap if the player is wanted. Set on the local player.

enumval.name: IsHolsteringWeapon
enumval.description: Ped is running the swap weapon task and holstering the previous weapon, but has not started drawing the new one.

enumval.name: UseGoToPointForScenarioNavigation
enumval.description: Don't use nav mesh for navigating to scenario points. DLC Hack for yachts

enumval.name: DontClearLocalPassengersWantedLevel
enumval.description: Don't clear local ped's wanted level when remote ped in the same car has his wanted level cleared by script.

enumval.name: BlockAutoSwapOnWeaponPickups
enumval.description: Block auto weapon swaps for weapon pickups.

enumval.name: ThisPedIsATargetPriorityForAI
enumval.description: Increase AI targeting score for peds with this flag.

enumval.name: IsSwitchingHelmetVisor
enumval.description: Indicates that ped is playing switch visor up/down anim

enumval.name: ForceHelmetVisorSwitch
enumval.description: Forces ped to do a visor helmet switch if able to.

enumval.name: IsPerformingVehicleMelee
enumval.description: Indicates that ped is performing vehicle melee action.

enumval.name: UseOverrideFootstepPtFx
enumval.description: The ped should use any override footstep effects that are set up.

enumval.name: DisableVehicleCombat
enumval.description: Disables vehicle combat.

enumval.name: TreatAsFriendlyForTargetingAndDamage
enumval.description: Prevents this ped from being locked on and blocks ability to damage / fire at ped.

enumval.name: AllowBikeAlternateAnimations
enumval.description: Allows players on motorcycles to use the alternate animation set when available.

enumval.name: TreatAsFriendlyForTargetingAndDamageNonSynced
enumval.description: Prevents this ped from being locked on and blocks ability to damage / fire at ped. This flag is not synced, so will only work on machine that set it

enumval.name: UseLockpickVehicleEntryAnimations
enumval.description: When set, will attempt to use lockpick animations designed for Franklin in SP mode when breaking into a car.

enumval.name: IgnoreInteriorCheckForSprinting
enumval.description: When set, player will be able to sprint inside interriors even if it is tagged to prevent it.

enumval.name: SwatHeliSpawnWithinLastSpottedLocation
enumval.description: When set, swat helicopters will spawn within last spotted location instead of actual ped location (and target is a player).

enumval.name: DisableStartEngine
enumval.description: prevents ped from playing start engine anims (and turning engine on)

enumval.name: IgnoreBeingOnFire
enumval.description: makes ped ignore being on fire (fleeing, reacting to CEventOnFire event)

enumval.name: DisableTurretOrRearSeatPreference
enumval.description: Disables turret seat and activity seat preference for vehicle entry for local player

enumval.name: DisableWantedHelicopterSpawning
enumval.description: Will not spawn wanted helicopters to chase after this target

enumval.name: UseTargetPerceptionForCreatingAimedAtEvents
enumval.description: Will only create aimed at events if player is within normal perception of the target

enumval.name: DisableHomingMissileLockon
enumval.description: Will prevent homing lockon on this ped

enumval.name: ForceIgnoreMaxMeleeActiveSupportCombatants
enumval.description: Ignore max number of active support combatants and let ped join them as such

enumval.name: StayInDefensiveAreaWhenInVehicle
enumval.description: Will try to stay within set defensive area while driving a vehicle

enumval.name: DontShoutTargetPosition
enumval.description: Will prevent the ped from communicating target position to all other friendly peds

enumval.name: DisableHelmetArmor
enumval.description: Will apply full headshot damage, regardless if ped has a helmet (or armored one)

enumval.name: CreatedByConcealedPlayer
enumval.description: Marks a ped that was created by concealed player from marked up scenarios

enumval.name: PermanentlyDisablePotentialToBeWalkedIntoResponse
enumval.description: Synced and permanent version of CPED_CONFIG_FLAG_DisablePotentialToBeWalkedIntoResponse

enumval.name: PreventVehExitDueToInvalidWeapon
enumval.description: Will prevent ped from automatically being forced out of vehicle due to weapon being invalid (e.g. turret seats after going into water)

enumval.name: IgnoreNetSessionFriendlyFireCheckForAllowDamage
enumval.description: Will ignore the friendly fire setting set by NETWORK_SET_FRIENDLY_FIRE_OPTION when checking if ped can be damaged

enumval.name: DontLeaveCombatIfTargetPlayerIsAttackedByPolice
enumval.description: Will make ped stay in combat even if the player hes targeting starts being attacked by cops

enumval.name: CheckLockedBeforeWarp
enumval.description: Will check when entering a vehicle if it is locked before warping

enumval.name: DontShuffleInVehicleToMakeRoom
enumval.description: Will prevent a player from shuffling across to make room if another player is entering from the same side

enumval.name: GiveWeaponOnGetup
enumval.description: Will give the ped a weapon to use once their weapon is removed for getups

enumval.name: DontHitVehicleWithProjectiles
enumval.description: Ped fired projectiles will ignore the vehicle they are in

enumval.name: DisableForcedEntryForOpenVehiclesFromTryLockedDoor
enumval.description: Will prevent ped from forcing entry into cars that are open from TryLockedDoor state

enumval.name: FiresDummyRockets
enumval.description: This ped will fire rockets that explode when close to its target, and won't affect it

enumval.name: PedIsArresting
enumval.description: Is the ped currently preforming an arrest

enumval.name: IsDecoyPed
enumval.description: Will make this ped a decoy ped that will focus targeting

enumval.name: HasEstablishedDecoy
enumval.description: This ped has created a decoy

enumval.name: BlockDispatchedHelicoptersFromLanding
enumval.description: Will prevent dispatched helicopters from landing and dropping off peds

enumval.name: DontCryForHelpOnStun
enumval.description: Will prevent peds from crying for help when shot with the stun gun

enumval.name: HitByTranqWeapon
enumval.description: Tranq weapons are handled differently in terms of damage. This triggers that logic

enumval.name: CanBeIncapacitated
enumval.description: If set, the ped may be incapacitated

enumval.name: ForcedAimFromArrest
enumval.description: If set, we will always behave like we have the aim trigger pressed

enumval.name: DontChangeTargetFromMelee
enumval.description: If set, we wont set a new target after a melee attack

enumval.name: DisableHealthRegenerationWhenStunned
enumval.description: Used to disable health regeneration when damaged with the stun gun in MP

enumval.name: RagdollFloatsIndefinitely
enumval.description: Prevents a dead ped from sinking

enumval.name: BlockElectricWeaponDamage
enumval.description: Blocks electric weapon damage
